items.sentence: Let\'s have a farewell party for Tom tomorrow.

We have to drive back home to Boston tomorrow.
Tom doesn\'t feel up to eating anything today.
Tom doesn\'t think Mary is as pretty as Alice.
I remember when we used to fight all the time.
